TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SqlColumnEncryptionKeyStoreProvider extends System.Object

summary.span: 所有金鑰存放區提供者的基底類別。

span.span: Base class for all key store providers.

summary.span: 自訂提供者必須衍生自這個類別，並覆寫其成員函式，然後使用 SqlConnection.RegisterColumnEncryptionKeyStoreProviders() 加以註冊。

span.span: A custom provider must derive from this class and override its member functions and then register it using SqlConnection.RegisterColumnEncryptionKeyStoreProviders().

summary.span: 如需詳細資料，請參閱 [Always Encrypted] (/sql/relational-databases/security/encryption/always-encrypted-database-engine)。

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract byte[] DecryptColumnEncryptionKey (string masterKeyPath, string encryptionAlgorithm, byte[] encryptedColumnEncryptionKey);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance unsigned int8[] DecryptColumnEncryptionKey(string masterKeyPath, string encryptionAlgorithm, unsigned int8[] encryptedColumnEncryptionKey) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function DecryptColumnEncryptionKey (masterKeyPath As String, encryptionAlgorithm As String, encryptedColumnEncryptionKey As Byte()) As Byte()

public: abstract cli::array <System::Byte> ^ DecryptColumnEncryptionKey(System::String ^ masterKeyPath, System::String ^ encryptionAlgorithm, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ encryptedColumnEncryptionKey);
abstract member DecryptColumnEncryptionKey : string * string * byte[] -> byte[]

param.name: encryptedColumnEncryptionKey
param.span: 已加密的資料行加密金鑰。

summary.span: 解密資料行加密金鑰指定的加密值。

span.span: Decrypts the specified encrypted value of a column encryption key.

summary.span: 加密值應該使用資料行主要金鑰搭配指定的金鑰路徑並使用指定的演算法加密。

span.span: The encrypted value is expected to be encrypted using the column master key with the specified key path and using the specified algorithm.

returns.span: 已解密的資料行加密金鑰。

span.span: to indicate that the column master key supports enclave computations; otherwise, .

summary.span: 在衍生類別中實作時，以 參數參考的資料行主要金鑰數位簽章資料行主要金鑰中繼資料。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, digitally signs the column master key metadata with the column master key referenced by the parameter.

summary.span: 用於產生簽章的輸入值，應該是 和 參數的指定值。

span.span: The input values used to generate the signature should be the specified values of the and parameters.

returns.span: 資料行主要金鑰中繼資料的簽章。

span.span: The signature of the column master key metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要確保方法不會中斷依賴舊的 API 應用程式，它會擲回預設的例外狀況。To ensure that the method doesn't break applications that rely on an old API, it throws a exception by default. 方法將會用來產生資料行主要金鑰 (CMK) 客戶的用戶端工具。The method will be used by client tools that generate Column Master Keys (CMK) for customers. 必須實作對應的金鑰存放區提供者想要使用與 enclaves[永遠加密](https://docs.microsoft.com/sql/relational-databases/security/encryption/always-encrypted-database-engine)。 must be implemented by the corresponding key store providers that wish to use enclaves with [Always Encrypted](https://docs.microsoft.com/sql/relational-databases/security/encryption/always-encrypted-database-engine).

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool VerifyColumnMasterKeyMetadata (string masterKeyPath, bool allowEnclaveComputations, byte[] signature);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool VerifyColumnMasterKeyMetadata(string masterKeyPath, bool allowEnclaveComputations, unsigned int8[] signature) cil managed
Public Overridable Function VerifyColumnMasterKeyMetadata (masterKeyPath As String, allowEnclaveComputations As Boolean, signature As Byte()) As Boolean
public: virtual bool VerifyColumnMasterKeyMetadata(System::String ^ masterKeyPath, bool allowEnclaveComputations, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ signature);
abstract member VerifyColumnMasterKeyMetadata : string * bool * byte[] -> bool override this.VerifyColumnMasterKeyMetadata : string * bool * byte[] -> bool

param.name: allowEnclaveComputations
param.span: 表示資料行主要金鑰是否支援 enclave 計算。

span.span: Indicates whether the column master key supports enclave computations.

param.name: signature
param.span: 資料行主要金鑰中繼資料的簽章。

span.span: The signature of the column master key metadata.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中實作時，這個方法應該驗證指定的簽章對資料行主要金鑰有效，此金鑰有指定的金鑰路徑和指定的 enclave 行為。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, this method is expected to verify the specified signature is valid for the column master key with the specified key path and the specified enclave behavior.

returns.span: 在衍生類別中實作時，如果指定的簽章有效，方法應該傳回 true；如果指定的簽章無效，應該傳回 false。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, the method is expected to return true if the specified signature is valid, or false if the specified signature is not valid.
